DOC.detailed_description: Introduction Elderly patient usually present high risk develop cardiopulmonary complication general anesthesia ( GA ) . The objective study compare PVB versus GA elderly patient undergo major abdominal surgery . The primary outcome measure admission Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) . The secondary objective postoperative analgesic consumption .
